gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bulls 114, Pelicans 106
gameRecap.excerpt: The Bulls defeated the Pelicans, 114-106 as they improved to 27-30 on the year. DeMar DeRozan led Chicago with 24 points, six rebounds, and seven assists while Nikola Vucevic (22 points, 13 rebounds) and Ayo Dosunmu (21 points, eight assists) added 43 points. Brandon Ingram (22 points, six assists) and Zion Williamson (19 points, 11 assists, eight rebounds) led the Pelicans. The Pelicans moved to 34-24 with the loss.
